title: Banpu NEXT forays into Asia-Pacific market for battery energy storage system, spearheaded by Durapower to capture ... - PR Newswire
summary: Banpu NEXT, a smart energy solutions provider in Asia-Pacific, is expanding its battery business by integrating with its subsidiary Durapower. The companies have successfully deployed a Battery Energy Storage System (BESS) at a solar hybrid power plant in Indonesia, supporting the transition to renewable energy and helping to reduce emissions. Banpu NEXT plans to offer this solution to other businesses and enterprise customers in the region, furthering their commitment to becoming a Net-Zero Energy Provider.

greenwashing: The article does not indicate any evidence of greenwashing, as the product and process described are genuinely focused on promoting renewable energy and reducing environmental impact.
